description technical detail:
ViewSonic Black 22" 5ms Widescreen LED Backlight LCD Monitor
The ViewSonic VA2246m-LED is a 22" widescreen monitor with a LED backlight and a glossy, thin-bezel design ideal for use in the home or at the office. With Full HD 1920 x 1080 resolution and a 10M:1 MEGA dynamic contrast ratio, the VA2246m-LED delivers stunning brightness and contrast, while a quick 5 ms response time ensures crisp pictures and smooth playback. As a complete multimedia package, the display also includes a pair of integrated speakers. VGA and DVI inputs provide flexible and convenient connectivity, while a VESA-mountable design offers additional mount flexibility. With a LED backlight and energy-saving eco-mode, the VA2246m-LED is an environmentally friendly display choice.
